reviews.text: Me and my wife stayed at the sandman the night before our flight to punta cana. We parked and had shuttles to/from the airport for free. This hotel is very upscale. The lobby is all slate tile with 8 flat screen tv's. The staff are very pleasant and helpful. At checkin, the room we were given was occupied, then the next room we were given the keys didnt work...and then the 3rd time was a charm. The girl at the front desk was very apologetic.

reviews.text: Upon entering our room I believe I actually squealed with delight! It was gorgeous! Very spacious, very clean, modern, and classy. The room we were upgraded to had a full kitchen -- big fridge, stove, microwave, pots and pans, cooking utensils, coffee maker, kettle, and toaster! It also had a living room w. a flat screen TV and a huge window with a view of the golf course. The bathroom was beautiful, by far the cleanest hotel bathroom I have ever seen and most modern looking...it even had a full laundry machine and dryer!
